content.raw:
Some of these things have been addressed on other issues, but just for completeness:

> Are we going to have to install the whole ros stack into our docker images in order to use them?

Yes, you must install everything you're going to use. 

> Is there a suggested baseline or stub Dockerfile that could be started from? 

There is an example docker file [here](https://github.com/scpeters/src_field_computer_test) which you can take a look. 

I'll close this issue, please reopen if something is left to be addressed.
